column1: pdf printable version born: april 9, 1928. place of birth: meigs county, ohdeath: june 18, 2015. place of death: tucson, azoccupation: world war ii, korea and vietnam us navy veteran, owned and operated a gas station in middleport, ohio and worked at the univeristy of arizona in tucson, arizona. this memorial provided by:angel valley funeral home. tucson, az memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
